Sentencas: This paper describes an original technique for the joint feature and model selection in the context of support vector machine (SVM) classification applied as a diagnosis strategy in model-based fault detection and isolation (FDI).
Titulo: Joint Feature and Model Selection for SVM Fault Diagnosis in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Systems

Sentencas: We demonstrate that the proposed technique contributes to the solution of an open research problem: to design a robust FDI procedure, correctly functioning with different operating conditions and fault sizes, specifically settled for an electric generation system based on solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Joint Feature and Model Selection for SVM Fault Diagnosis in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Systems

Sentencas: By using a quantitative model of the generation system coupled to an optimized SVM classifier, a satisfactory FDI procedure is achieved, which is robust against modeling and measurement errors and is compliant with practical deployment.
Titulo: Joint Feature and Model Selection for SVM Fault Diagnosis in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Systems
